title: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launches an Investigation of the Board of Directors of Solera Holdings, Inc. Regarding the Sale of the Company to Vista Equity Partners -- SL
text: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launches an Investigation of the Board of Directors of Solera Holdings, Inc. Regarding the Sale of the Company to Vista Equity Partners -- SL Â» Science & Technology Published on 2015-09-25 08:31:28 SLH SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The Law Offices of Vincent Wong Launches an Investigation of... -- NEW YORK  The Law Offices of Vincent Wong logo The Law Offices of Vincent Wong logo   NEW YORK   The Law Offices of Vincent Wong are investigating potential claims against the Board of Directors of Solera Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: [[]]) ("Solera Holdings" or "the Company") in connection with the sale of the Company to Vista Equity Partners. Under the terms of the transaction, Solera Holdings shareholders will receive $55.85 in cash for each share of Solera Holdings stock they own. Click here to learn about the case: [[]] . There is no cost or obligation to you. The investigation concerns whether the Board of Solera Holdings breached their fiduciary duties to stockholders by failing to adequately shop the Company before agreeing to enter into this transaction, and whether Vista Equity Partners is underpaying for Solera Holdings shares. If you own common stock in Solera Holdings and wish to obtain additional information, please contact Vincent Wong, Esq. either via email [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW0xaGFXeDBienAyZDBCM2IyNW5aWE54TG1OdmJWd2lJSEpsYkQxY0ltNXZabTlzYkc5M1hDSWdkR0Z5WjJWMFBWd2lYMkpzWVc1clhDSStkbmRBZDI5dVoyVnpjUzVqYjIwOEwyRSt8]], by telephone at 212.425.1140, or visit [[]] . Vincent Wong, Esq. is an experienced attorney that has represented investors in securities litigations involving financial fraud and violations of shareholder rights. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. CONTACT:
